Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Harrison/St. Louis
ShortDescription: EB 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Central Park, Jackson, Homan and Harrison due to street blockage near Harrison/St. Louis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Central Park, Jackson, Homan and Harrison due to street blockage near Harrison/St. Louis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at State/116th
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, State, 111th, Wentworth and 115th due to street blockage near State/116th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, State, 111th, Wentworth and 115th due to street blockage near State/116th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan, #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/116th
ShortDescription: SB 34 South Michigan, 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th & Michigan due to street blockage near State/116th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan, #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Indiana, 116th & Michigan due to street blockage near State/116th

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Granville
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
